QuestData.Title: The Last Refugee
QuestData.Description: There was this massive earthquake and then everything went black. The next thing I know, I woke up here a prisoner. The whole place is overrun with air elementals!$B$BI hope that everyone's okay. These Twillight's Hammer scum better not have hurt any of my friends!$B$BQuick, $c, use something sharp to jimmy the lock on this ball and chain. Together we should be able to make it to the refugee camp.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Speak with Elisa Steelhand at the Auberdine Refugee Camp in Darkshore.
QuestData.RewardText: Aye, you're the fine $g lad : lass; who saved my Hollee!$B$BWell, I've got a fitting reward for you here, I'm sure. We really can't thank you enough for bringing her to safety, $n.
